price: Ya ku waɗan da suka yi ĩmãni! Ku ciyar daga mai kyaun abin da kuka sanã'anta, kuma daga abin da Muka fitar sabõda ku daga ƙasa, kuma kada ku yi nufin mummuna ya zama daga gare shi ne kuke ciyarwa, alhãli kuwa ba ku zama mãsu karɓarsa ba fãce kun runtse ido a cikin sa. Kuma ku sani cẽwa lalle ne, Allah Mawadãci ne, Gõdadde.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَنفِقُواْ مِن طَيِّبَٰتِ مَا كَسَبۡتُمۡ وَمِمَّآ أَخۡرَجۡنَا لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَلَا تَيَمَّمُواْ ٱلۡخَبِيثَ مِنۡهُ تُنفِقُونَ وَلَسۡتُم بِـَٔاخِذِيهِ إِلَّآ أَن تُغۡمِضُواْ فِيهِۚ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٌ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū anfiqū min ṭayyibāti mā kasabtum wamimmā akhrajnā lakum mina al-arḍi walā tayammamū al-khabītha min'hu tunfiqūna walastum biākhidhīhi illā an tugh'miḍū fīhi wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha ghaniyyun ḥamīdun
